attributes.action: make it illegal for the taxation proportion of any product or service to exceed 20% of the selling price
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Petrol (at least 75% of the pump price)and tobacco (more than seven pounds for a product that costs less than ten pence to manufacture) are the most blatant examples, but there are doubtless others where the taxation element is out of all proportion to the manufacturing costs and a reasonable profit percentage. This increase inflation, makes products not affordable for many people and puts jobs at risk.
